name: 14DAYPILOT FLIGHT ACADEMY
about: 14DAYPILOT Flight Academy, based at Van Nuys Airport in Los Angeles, is a leading provider of accelerated flight training in the U.S. Designed for executives and serious pilots, our program offers luxury VIP flight instruction with a 1:1 student-to-instructor ratio and dedicated aircraft for each student. Our senior instructors are available up to 6 hours daily, ensuring personalized and intensive training. The academy is known for its fast-track programs, allowing students to achieve their pilot ratings in as little as a few weeks. With a focus on checkride readiness and support from experienced instructors and designated pilot examiners, 14DAYPILOT ensures a comprehensive and efficient aviation training experience. Despite recent updates indicating the academy is closed, its legacy as an industry leader in accelerated flight training remains.
